targets.rawSql: SELECT from_unixtime(timestamp - 3600) as date, expected as Prognose, min as Prognose_min, max as Prognose_max FROM pv.prognose_live

targets.expr:
sum(increase(meter{position="grid",type="counter",direction="in",location="$Location"}[1d] offset -1d))/1000 
- sum(increase(meter{position="grid",type="counter",direction="out",location="$Location"}[1d] offset -1d))/1000
+ sum_over_time(
    sum(meter{location="$Location",position="battery",type="gauge"}>=0)[1d:5s] offset -1d
)  / 720 / 1000
+ sum_over_time(
    sum(meter{location="$Location",position="battery",type="gauge"}<=0)[1d:5s] offset -1d
)  / 720 / 1000
+ sum_over_time(
    sum(meter{location="$Location",position="generator",type="gauge"}>0)[1d:5s] offset -1d
)  / 720 / 1000

-sum(increase((meter{description="Wärmepumpe",location="$Location",position="device",type="counter"} or vector(0))[1d:5s] offset -1d)) / 1000

list.definition: select battery from pv.config where location='$Location';
list.name: battery
list.query: select battery from pv.config where location='$Location';
